overview: In order to think and study about happiness, I chose to make my film by going through and re-elaborating the "home movies" of Adolf Hitler and Eva Braun, dated between 1938 and 1944, images of a private life, far from the clamor of the war and rich in moments of family joy, those that the "intimate circle" of the German dictator and his companion spent in the mountain refuge-house of Berghof or in the various trips around Europe.
title: That Elusive Balance
